branchItem.name: HED-W, Thermoelectric Chiller for Chemicals (Controller / Heat Exchanger Combination)
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Cooling capacity: 300 W, 500 W, 750 W <LI>Temperature range setting: 10 to 60°C <LI>Temperature stability: ±0.1°C <LI>Power supply requirement: single phase 180 ~ 242 VAC, 50/60Hz <LI>Circulating fluid: Various liquid chemicals, see catalog (fluororesin compatible) <LI>Standards: Ce, SEMI S2-0706, F47-0706, RoHS </LI></UL>

branchItem.name: HED-H, Liquid Chemical Heat Exchanger
HED-C, Controller for Thermoelectric Chiller
